# Public holidays

```{r}
holidays_18 <- aus_public_holidays %>% 
  filter(year(date) == "2018") %>% 
  group_by(holiday_name) %>% 
  mutate(n = n()) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(national = ifelse(n == 8, "yes", "no"),
         local = ifelse(n == 1, "yes", "no")) %>% 
select(-n)
```
